Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class serves as the main controller of the application. It contains methods for retrieving information to be displayed in a resume/CV, as well as creating and saving basic information for the resume/CV.

  • Constructor Summary

    Default constructor

    • createBasicInformation

      public String createBasicInformation(String name, int age, String school, String major, String admission_time, String graduation_time, File head)
      Creates basic information for a resume/CV with the given parameters and saves it to file.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      age - The age of the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      school - The school attended by the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      major - The major of study for the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      admission_time - The date of admission for the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      graduation_time - The date of graduation for the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      head - A file containing the image of the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      Returns:
      The path to the saved image of the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.

    • newCreateBasicInformation

      public static String newCreateBasicInformation(String name, int age, String school, String major, String admission_time, String graduation_time, int selection)
      Creates basic information for a resume/CV with the given parameters and saves it to file with a specified selection.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      age - The age of the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      school - The school attended by the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      major - The major of study for the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      admission_time - The date of admission for the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      graduation_time - The date of graduation for the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.
      selection - A specified selection for saving the basic information to file.
      Returns:
      The path to the saved image of the individual for whom the resume/CV is being created.

    • changeBasicInformation

      public static String changeBasicInformation(String name, int age, String school, String major, String admission_time, String graduation_time, File head)
      Changes the basic information of the user.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      age - The age of the user.
      school - The school of the user.
      major - The major of the user.
      admission_time - The admission time of the user.
      graduation_time - The graduation time of the user.
      head - The head image file of the user.
      Returns:
      The saved image file path with "/image.png" appended to it on successful save; null on failure to save.

    • newChangeBasicInformation

      public static String newChangeBasicInformation(String name, int age, String school, String major, String admission_time, String graduation_time, int selection)
      Changes the basic information of the user.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      age - The age of the user.
      school - The school of the user.
      major - The major of the user.
      admission_time - The admission time of the user.
      graduation_time - The graduation time of the user.
      selection - The selection option (0: default avatar, 1: select from album, 2: take a photo).
      Returns:
      The saved image file path on successful save; null on failure to save.

      public static int createSkill(String title, String content, String proficiency, String project) throws URISyntaxException
      Creates a new skill item.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the skill.
      content - The content of the skill.
      proficiency - The proficiency level of the skill.
      project - The project associated with the skill.
      Returns:
      A status flag indicating whether the item was saved successfully (1: success, 0: failure).
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If there's an issue with the URI syntax.

    • createCourse

      public static int createCourse(String title, String content, String time, String type, String teacher, int grade, int credit) throws URISyntaxException
      This method creates a new course with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the course.
      content - The content of the course.
      time - The time of the course.
      type - The type of the course.
      teacher - The teacher of the course.
      grade - The grade of the course.
      credit - The credit of the course.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the success of creating the course (1 for success, 0 for failure).
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If there is an error parsing the URI.

    • changeCourse

      public static int changeCourse(String title, String content, String time, String type, String teacher, int grade, int credit) throws URISyntaxException
      This method changes an existing course with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the course.
      content - The content of the course.
      time - The time of the course.
      type - The type of the course.
      teacher - The teacher of the course.
      grade - The grade of the course.
      credit - The credit of the course.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the success of changing the course (1 for success, 0 for failure).
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If there is an error parsing the URI.

    • deleteCourse

      public static boolean deleteCourse(String title) throws URISyntaxException
      This method deletes an existing course with the given title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the course to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A boolean representing the success of deleting the course (true for success, false for failure).
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If there is an error parsing the URI.

    • getCoursesByYearAndByTypeForwardSort

      public static String getCoursesByYearAndByTypeForwardSort(int year, String type) throws URISyntaxException, ParseException
      This method gets the courses in a given year and type with forward sorting.
      Parameters:
      year - The year to get the courses for.
      type - The type of the courses to get.
      Returns:
      A string containing the courses in JSON format.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - If there is an error parsing the URI.
      ParseException - If there is an error parsing the JSON.

    • addZeroToDate

      public static String addZeroToDate(String date)
      Adds leading zeros to a date string in the format "yyyy-mm-dd".
      Parameters:
      date - a string representing the date to be formatted
      Returns:
      a string representing the formatted date with leading zeros in the year and month fields

    • deleteZeroToDate

      public static String deleteZeroToDate(String date)
      Removes leading zeros from a date string in the format "yyyy-mm-dd".
      Parameters:
      date - a string representing the date to be formatted
      Returns:
      a string representing the formatted date without leading zeros in the year and month fields
